post.description: Get recent policy alerts for device, grouped by time. Groups are constructed of alerts that occur within 2 minutes of the previous alert, up to a maximum of 50. Results are returned in reverse-chronological order, so all fields are relative to that ordering.
post.summary: Get recent policy alerts for device, grouped by time

post.description: Get recent policy alerts for a location, grouped by time. Groups are constructed of alerts that occur within 2 minutes of the previous alert, up to a maximum of 50. Results are returned in reverse-chronological order, so all fields are relative to that ordering.
post.summary: Get recent policy alerts for a location, grouped by time

post.description: Get recent policy alerts for organization, grouped by time. Groups are constructed of alerts that occur within 2 minutes of the previous alert, up to a maximum of 50. Results are returned in reverse-chronological order, so all fields are relative to that ordering.
post.summary: Get recent policy alerts for organization, grouped by time
